DOC.detailed_description: Idiopathic hypogonadotropic hypogonadism ( IHH ) common disorder sex development ( DSD ) .Therapy IHH include hormone replacement therapy , gonadotropin therapy pulse infusion gonadotropin release hormone ( GnRH ) .In present study , compare different efficacy safety pulsatile GnRH pump therapy combination gonadotropin therapy fertility sexual development male patient IHH . The primary endpoint achievement pregnancy female partner . Secondary endpoint time actual attainment various sperm threshold : sperm concentration > 0*10^6/ml , > 1.0 *10^6/ml > 15 *10^6/ml , respectively . The clinical laboratory characteristic include testicular prostatic volume , Tanner stage pubic hair genital , serum hormone level [ especially serum testosterone , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , Follicle-Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) level ] , sperm concentration per ejaculate , adverse event baseline end treatment also evaluate .
